panels.content:
OPNFV_Yardstick_TC002 - Network latency (Ping)

Evaluation of network latency (RTT - round trip time) between two VM instances running on different physical blades. For more information see TC002

targets.query: SELECT "rtt.ares" FROM "opnfv_yardstick_tc002" WHERE "pod_name" =~ /$POD$/ AND "deploy_scenario" =~ /$SCENARIO$/ AND "version" =~ /$VERSION$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "pod_name", "task_id", "deploy_scenario"

panels.content:
OPNFV_Yardstick_TC005 - Storage Performance (Fio)

To evaluate the IaaS storage performance with regards to IOPS, throughput and latency. For more information see TC005

targets.query: SELECT "read_bw" FROM "opnfv_yardstick_tc005" WHERE "pod_name" =~ /$POD$/ AND "deploy_scenario" =~ /$SCENARIO$/ AND "version" =~ /$VERSION$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "pod_name", "task_id", "deploy_scenario"
SELECT "read_iops" FROM "opnfv_yardstick_tc005" WHERE "pod_name" =~ /$POD$/ AND "deploy_scenario" =~ /$SCENARIO$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "pod_name", "task_id", "deploy_scenario"

panels.content:
OPNFV_Yardstick_TC010 - Memory Latency (Lmbench)

Measure the memory read latency for varying memory sizes and strides. Whole memory hierarchy is measured including all levels of cache. For more information see TC010

targets.query: SELECT "latencies0.latency" FROM "opnfv_yardstick_tc010" WHERE "pod_name" =~ /$POD$/ AND "deploy_scenario" =~ /$SCENARIO$/ AND "version" =~ /$VERSION$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "pod_name", "task_id", "deploy_scenario"

panels.content:
OPNFV_Yardstick_TC011 - Packet delay variation (Iperf3)

Measure the packet delay variation sending the packets from one VM to the other. For more information see TC011

targets.query: SELECT "end.sum.jitter_ms" FROM "opnfv_yardstick_tc011" WHERE "pod_name" =~ /$POD$/ AND "deploy_scenario" =~ /$SCENARIO$/ AND "version" =~ /$VERSION$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "pod_name", "task_id", "deploy_scenario"

panels.content:
OPNFV_Yardstick_TC012 - Memory read and write bandwidth

Visualisation of memory read and write bandwidth using lmbench as the measurement tool. For more information see TC012

targets.query: SELECT "bandwidth(MBps)" FROM "opnfv_yardstick_tc012" WHERE "pod_name" =~ /$POD$/ AND "deploy_scenario" =~ /$SCENARIO$/ AND "version" =~ /$VERSION$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "pod_name", "deploy_scenario"

panels.content:
OPNFV_Yardstick_TC063 - Disk size, block size and disk utilization

Visualisation of disk size, block size and disk utilization using fdisk and iostat. For more information see TC063

targets.query: SELECT "Total disk size in bytes" FROM "opnfv_yardstick_tc063" WHERE "pod_name" =~ /$POD$/ AND "deploy_scenario" =~ /$SCENARIO$/ AND "version" =~ /$VERSION$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "pod_name", "deploy_scenario"

SELECT "Number of devices" FROM "opnfv_yardstick_tc063" WHERE "pod_name" =~ /$POD$/ AND "deploy_scenario" =~ /$SCENARIO$/ AND "version" =~ /$VERSION$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "pod_name", "deploy_scenario"

panels.title: tc063: Disk size, block size and disk utilization

panels.content:

Visualisation of disk size, block size and disk utilization using fdisk and iostat. For more information see TC063

Visualisation of network latency (RTT - round trip time), packet throughput and CPU load when doing variations to the amount of UDP flows between two VM instances running on different physical blades. For more information see TC037

SELECT mean("rtt.poseidon") FROM "opnfv_yardstick_tc037" WHERE "pod_name" =~ /$POD$/ AND "deploy_scenario" =~ /$SCENARIO$/ AND "version" =~ /$VERSION$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(12h), "pod_name", "deploy_scenario"

SELECT "flows" FROM "opnfv_yardstick_tc037" WHERE "pod_name" =~ /$POD$/ AND "deploy_scenario" =~ /$SCENARIO$/ AND "version" =~ /$VERSION$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "pod_name", "deploy_scenario", "task_id"

SELECT "packets_per_second" FROM "opnfv_yardstick_tc037" WHERE "pod_name" =~ /$POD$/ AND "deploy_scenario" =~ /$SCENARIO$/ AND "version" =~ /$VERSION$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "pod_name", "deploy_scenario", "task_id"

panels.content:
OPNFV_Yardstick_TC074 - Storage Performance Benchmarking for NFVI (Storperf)

Measure block and object storage performance in an NFVI. For more information see TC074

targets.query: SELECT "_ssd_preconditioning.queue-depth.8.block-size.16384.duration" FROM "opnfv_yardstick_tc074" WHERE "pod_name" =~ /$POD$/ AND "deploy_scenario" =~ /$SCENARIO$/ AND "version" =~ /$VERSION$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "pod_name", "deploy_scenario", "task_id"

SELECT "_warm_up.queue-depth.8.block-size.16384.duration" FROM "opnfv_yardstick_tc074" WHERE "pod_name" =~ /$POD$/ AND "deploy_scenario" =~ /$SCENARIO$/ AND "version" =~ /$VERSION$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "pod_name", "deploy_scenario", "task_id"

SELECT "wr.queue-depth.4.block-size.4096.duration" FROM "opnfv_yardstick_tc074" WHERE "pod_name" =~ /$POD$/ AND "deploy_scenario" =~ /$SCENARIO$/ AND "version" =~ /$VERSION$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "pod_name", "deploy_scenario", "task_id"
